name: Igor's lost eggs
description:
Igor's lost eggs is my first game and I think it's kinda fun. I suggest you to give a try, its a really short game. Everything is made from scratch (except the boxes in the 3th level). Arts were made by my girlfriend who loves dinosaurs. We're and the game is french too but you can skip the story part. Hope to receive your feedback :) 

                                                                                                                                      -LaGougouneDiabolique
